channel.title: Kubernetes on Josh Wood
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Josh Wood

item.title: Migration report
item.author: j@joshix.com (Josh Wood)
item.description: History Many of the words and pictures here have been around long enough to stumble mumbling through generations of domain names and server styles, from hand-crafted hardware hooked to home DSL, to containers shipped to the Cloud. This site is like your grandmother’s sofa. It gets moved more often than it gets updated. This is the boring part of that story, outlining all the different ways much the same content has been constructed and delivered.
